title: Expedia swipes valuable luggage?
content:
Has anybody noticed the font used in Expedia’s  
current TV ads? It reminds me quite strongly of  
Mylius, the font that British Airways commissioned  
recently - the one with the scimitar-like tail on the “y”.

Anything gives?

hhp

 [‹ Henk Krijger / Raffia Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20071101141514/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10336 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a glyph from a contemporary typeface with a convincing "beak" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071101141514/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17097 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hrant
